meanings.sent1: The possessory rights were clearly outlined in the contract.
meanings.sent2: She had a possessory interest in the antique vase.
meanings.sent3: The possessory claim over the lost treasure sparked a heated debate.
meanings.sent4: His possessory nature made him fiercely protective of his belongings.
meanings.sent5: The possessory relationship between the artist and his masterpiece was evident in every stroke.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the right of possession.
meanings.sent1: The possessory agreement granted him exclusive use of the property.
meanings.sent2: Legal documents clarified their possessory rights over the land.
meanings.sent3: The possessory dispute ended with a fair settlement for both parties.
meanings.sent4: She felt a possessory claim over the last piece of cake.
meanings.sent5: His possessory claim to the throne was challenged by a rival claimant.

meanings.sent1: The possessory owner proudly displayed his collection of stamps.
meanings.sent2: She was the possessory holder of the rare artifact.
meanings.sent3: The possessory neighbor always borrowed sugar from her.
meanings.sent4: His possessory attitude towards the car made him wash it every day.
meanings.sent5: The possessory bond between the dog and its owner was unbreakable.
